"Swarming Beasts":
"Agnises are nothing once you get used to 'em.
Huh? Did I get hurt? No way! I didn't even get
a scratch. I've been going deep into the Greenscape
lately, so I've been extra careful about not getting
any injuries. Plus, I make it a point to stay away
from unnecessary battles. Like when I see a Galph
or a Phongalph, you know what I do? I run the
other way! Huh? I should try to defeat them?!
Are you insane? I need to see how you do it first!"

"アギニスなんて慣れりゃどうってことねえな
え？　ケガ？
……し、してねえよ、どっこも。
最近、任務で森の奥へ行くことが多いから
ケガには注意してるからよ。
それにオレ、余計な争いは避ける主義だから
ガルフやらフォンガルフが出てきたら
おとなしく逃げることにしてんだ。
撃破しろって？　無茶振りすんなよ！
だったらおたくが手本を見せてくれっての！"
